text:
Iâ€™d like to point out this issue if anyone would like to help upvote it: <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Make-it-possible-to-configure-HubDB-rich-text-editor/idc-p/875278#M159678>

Recently noticed that the HubDB Rich Text field assigns a font family no matter what.  So our site fonts are overwritten by inline fonts that do not match the theme.  And there is no way to *not* select a font family in the rich text editor on a HubDB table.
